comment._content: Best I can tell, this is looking north from Hull St. toward Bainbridge.

comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: Exactly correct; Cowardin Avenue. The church on the left is on the corner of Cowardin and Bainbridge and was St. Luke's Episcopal Church. It is now a Nation of Islam mosque.

comment.author: 61549083@N08
comment._content: across from the church is Bainbridge Jr High school.I use to catch the Oak Grove buss in front of the church..Those were the days ....
